column4: Has anyone had firsthand experience installing Ubuntu's "restricted" packaging of the legacy Nvidia (old 7100 tree) drivers on a Gutsy server/base install? I cannot use nvidia-xconfig as this driver tree doesn't have it. While I get the Nvidia splashscreen, glxinfo reports no 3D accel. The driver uneventfully modprobed. If I need to RTFM or STFW, a link or hint would be helpful.
i have tried, but i cannot get it to work
, i got 3 different programs installed, all suggested from here the only one that seems to convert avi to DVD is devede, and it freezes at 2%, then again at 6%
